Package dotandboxclient

Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
networking.SocketConnection
dotandboxclient.ClientConnection
public class ClientConnection extends SocketConnection
This is the class which is in charge of handling and sending messages to the server socket.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientConnection

      protected ClientConnection(InetAddress host, int port, DotAndBoxClient client) throws IOException
      The constructor fot the ClientConnection. As soon as a ClientConnection is created, it invokes start() method to start a thread reading messages.
      Parameters:
      host - the address of the host
      port - the port that server is at
      client - the particular client
      Throws:
      IOException - - If an I/O error occurs.

  • Method Details

    • handleStart

      public void handleStart()
      Handle at the start when the thread starts receiving message from the socket.
      Overrides:
      handleStart in class SocketConnection

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage(String messageFromServer) throws WrongFormatProtocol, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Handle the received messageFromServer from server socket. The protocol can be either HELLO, LOGIN, ALREADYLOGGEDIN, LIST NEWGAME, MOVE, GAMEOVER
      Specified by:
      handleMessage in class SocketConnection
      Parameters:
      messageFromServer - the messageFromServer received from the connection
      Throws:
      WrongFormatProtocol
      UnsupportedEncodingException
